verses.verse: That <S%G5209>ye<s%> be <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5030>soon<s%> <S%G4531>shaken<s%> <S%G575>in<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%> <S%G3383>or<s%> be <S%G2360>troubled,<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G3056>word,<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1992>letter<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1223>from<s%> <S%G2257>us,<s%> as <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is at <S%G1764>hand.<s%>

Let <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1818>deceive<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3367>any<s%> <S%G5158>means:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> that day shall not come, <S%G3362>except<s%> there <S%G2064>come<s%> a falling <S%G646>away<s%> <S%G4412>first,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G444>man<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> be <S%G601>revealed,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G684>perdition;<s%>

Who <S%G480>opposeth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> exalteth <S%G5229>himself<s%> <S%G1909>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> that is <S%G4574>worshiped;<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2523>sitteth<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G584>showing<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

Remember <S%G3421><s%> ye <S%G3756>not,<s%> <S%G3754>that,<s%> when I <S%G5607>was<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> I <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> these <S%G5023>things?<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> what <S%G2722>withholdeth<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> might be <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G2540>time.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G458>iniquity<s%> doth <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G1754>work:<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> he who now <S%G2722>letteth<s%> <S%G737><s%> will let, <S%G2193>until<s%> he be <S%G1096>taken<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3319>way.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> shall that <S%G459>Wicked<s%> be <S%G601>revealed,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall <S%G355>consume<s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G2673>destroy<s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2015>brightness<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> coming: <S%G3952><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G539>deceivableness<s%> of <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> them that <S%G622>perish;<s%> <S%G473>because<s%> <S%G3739><s%> they <S%G1209>received<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth,<s%> that <S%G846>they<s%> might be <S%G4982>saved.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> for this <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> shall <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> strong <S%G1753>delusion,<s%> <S%G4106><s%> that <S%G846>they<s%> should <S%G4100>believe<s%> a lie: <S%G5579><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> they <S%G3956>all<s%> might be <S%G2919>damned<s%> who <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> had <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> are <S%G3784>bound<s%> to give <S%G2168>thanks<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G25>beloved<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> hath <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> <S%G138>chosen<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G38>sanctification<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>belief<s%> of the truth: <S%G225><s%>

Whereunto <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2098>gospel,<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G4047>obtaining<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
